segments.text: Hello there ! Come on in ! Don ’ t just stand there ! Come and take a seat !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Um , okay . Well , I just want a trim . Nothing too fancy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh my gosh ! Your hair is amazing ! So silky , so shiny ! I am going to work my magic on your hair ! You hear me ? You are going to look like a million bucks !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay . Um ... can you make sure my sideburns are even and you just take a little off the top .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don ’ t you worry , I ’ ll take care of everything ! Oh my god ! I just love your curly hair ! It ’ s so fluffy and cute ! You should totally let it grow out . An afro would look great on you !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay , but you are going to be my masterpiece !
segments.speaker: S1
